contextId.occurrenceNote: The author says this because not all of Levi's sons became priests. Alternate translation: "The descendants of Levi who became priests" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-distinguish]])
contextId.quote: τῶν υἱῶν Λευεὶ τὴν ἱερατείαν λαμβάνοντες
contextId.glQuote: The sons of Levi who receive the priesthood
